name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRRRGGHHH!!!!!!』
The Werewolf roared into the night sky and swung his sharp claws down.
But we weren't giving in either.

name: Jisai
text: Ace Katana Style!!!

name: Hebiko
text: F-Four Blade Style!!!
Their blades sparkled in unison.

name: Hebiko
text: Got him?!
*Slash!*

name: Hebiko
text: Kyaah!?

name: Jisai
text: Watch out!!
Even after being cut by the two of them, the Werewolf showed no signs of fatigue and swung his sharp claws in anger.

name: Hebiko
text: No way... How can he be so tough!?

name: Jisai
text: If this keeps up, we're going to be the ones getting exhausted.
No wonder he had been boasting about taking us on five against one. Even facing Shishigami and Hebiko at the same time, his prowess was unfaltering.

name: Gangster 1
text: G-Get them!

name: Gangster 2
text: Good! Tear them all apart!!

name: Me
text: (The other guys seem to be human... But why is there a Werewolf among normal gangsters!?)

name: Shikanosuke
text: H-Hey, Fuma!!!

name: Shikanosuke
text: What the hell is that guy!? Even Shishigami and Hebiko together aren't able to give him a single scratch.

name: Me
text: Yeah, Werewolves areー
『Werewolvesーalso known as lycanthropes. A type of wolf from the Devildom that can turn into a human.
They possess robust and flexible bodies, great power, regenerative abilities to immediately heal lacerations, and sharp claws and fangs that can even tear through steel.
The golden gleam of their eyes dulls the mind and paralyzes any ordinary person, rendering them unable to move.
If you are unfortunate enough to encounter one, avoid combat at all costs and retreat immediately.』

name: Me
text: They are truly dangerous monsters.

name: Shikanosuke
text: A-And those two somehow seem to be moving slower than usual...
That must have been because of the power of the Werewolf's golden beast eye. I wasn't getting paralyzed by it either, but my body did have some kind of tingling sensation.

name: Me
text: But it ends here. Shikanosuke, it's your turn.

name: Shikanosuke
text: A-Alright! I'm gonna show him!
When I gave the signal, Hebiko and Shishigami nodded at each other, then leaped towards the Werewolf's face.

name: Jisai
text: Ace Katana Style: Blade Dance of Divinity!!

name: Hebiko
text: Octopus Tentacle Four Blade Style!!

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRGH!?』
And when the Werewolf stopped moving for an instantー

name: Me
text: Now!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Here I go!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Electric Jutsu Ultimate Skill! Bambi-no Spark!!!

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRRRGH!?!?!?!』
The electric energy discharged by Shikanosuke took the form of two fawns that rushed the Werewolf.

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRGH!?? GRRRRGH!!!』

name: Jisai
text: Now!

name: Hebiko
text: Alright! Let's do this!!
The swords of Shishigami and Hebiko pierced the Werewolf as he struggled to escape the heat.

name: Shikanosuke
text: D-Did we do it!? Did we kill him!?

name: Jisai
text: We didn't kill him. Fuma told us not to kill him because it would make everything even more complicated.

name: Hebiko
text: D-Did he? ...Ahaha...

name: Me
text: Hebiko, come on now...

name: Hebiko
text: More importantly, Shikanosuke-chan's attack earlier! That was an amazing super-skill!!

name: Jisai
text: Did you awaken to a new ability?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Hehe... would be nice if that was the case. It's all thanks to Fuma.

name: Hebiko
text: Thanks to Fuma-chan?

name: Me
text: Yeah, I had a talk with the maintenance department and had them make a battery for Shikanosuke.

name: Shikanosuke
text: So it's just temporarily boosting my power. Unfortunately, it's not my own strength.

name: Hebiko
text: Oh, but it's you who's controlling that energy, isn't it? Then it's a new ability!

name: Shikanosuke
text: Ehehe...
Behind Shikanosuke, who didn't look completely unhappy, the Werewolf's giant body wriggled.

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRR... RRGH...』

name: Jisai
text: This guy... is still able to move!?

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRRRGH!!! YOU TAImaNIN brATS!!! Don't UNDerESTImate ME!!!』
Even though his wounds were not fatal, they still should have been extremely painful if he moved. Despite that, the Werewolf struggled in an attempt to attack us again.

name: Me
text: Do you want to die!? Don't struggle.

name: Werewolf
text: 『AH... AH... AWOOOOOOOOHH!!!!!』
When the Werewolf howled, his wounds suddenly began to close and, if anything, his muscles even seemed to be bulging.

name: Me
text: What!? ー!! Don't tell me...
The clouds cleared and moonlight illuminated the city. I remembered one of the pieces about Werewolves that I had read in the library of Gosha.
Never fight a Werewolf, especially not on a night of the full moon. No matter how much of a veteran Taimanin you are.

name: Werewolf
text: 『GRRRRRGGGHHH!!!』
The Werewolf's wounds closed before our eyes, and his burnt coat regrew, glossy and new.

name: Werewolf
text: 『AWOOOOOOOHH!!!!』
And then he swung his powerful arm and sent Shishigami and Hebiko flying.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Aieeee!? I-I'm already out of powerrrrrr!?

name: Hebiko
text: Owowow... What is this!? It might be looking bad!?

name: Jisai
text: His power is on a completely different level from before...! Fuma, give me permission to use my Divine Jutsu!!

name: Me
text: No, you can't!!! Not right in the middle of the city!!!

name: Jisai
text: Ugh...!
That was Shishigami's way-too-powerful Ninja Art. As much as I would've liked to let her use it, it was the absolute last resort.

name: Werewolf
text: 『WHat's WRoooNG?!!! I'm goNNA DEVour YOu aLL!!!』
Meanwhile, the eyes of the Werewolf, who was overflowing with power, gleamed at the turning of the tables.

name: Hebiko
text: Fuma-chan... Hebiko feels weak.

name: Me
text: Me too... His golden beast eyes must have gotten more powerful as well.

name: Gangster 1
text: Hooray! It's a blessing from the heavens!!

name: Gangster 2
text: Get them!

name: Gangster 1
text: !? Wait, behind you...!

name: Werewolf
text: 『WHat...?』

name: Chevalier
text: What a troublesome doggy♪
When had she gotten behind him?
Chevalier held a delicate bottle in her hand and sprinkled a mysterious liquid on the Werewolf's tail.

name: Werewolf
text: 『!? WhAT!? WHat are YOu doING!?! GRRrgghh...』
And then smoke rose from the Werewolf's tail, eventually enveloping him completelyー

name: Gangster Leader
text: Gyaaaaaaaah!? Wh-What did you do!?
By the time the smoke had cleared, the Werewolf had completely turned back into a human.

name: Chevalier
text: That was a potion that absorbs any supernatural power. It looks like the experiment was a success.

name: Gangster Leader
text: Experiment...!?

name: Chevalier
text: You're fortunate that you didn't turn into some kind of weird creature.

name: Gangster Leader
text: Damn it... you monster!!
The Werewolf kept cursing, but had no strength left to fight.
Then Hebiko quickly restrained him with her octopus legs. The other gangsters also lost the will to fight, put down their guns, and raised their hands.
And a few minutes later.
We were inside the house of Chevalier the alchemist, together with the still tied-up leader.

name: Me
text: Well then, let me ask you again. Why did you suddenly attack this place? And what did you mean by "the guys who got your old man"?

name: Gangster Leader
text: I... we are members of an old underground organization that has been doing business in Tokyo Kingdom for a long time.

name: Gangster Leader
text: That being said, there are only about 10 members in total, a small-time gang you might say.

name: Gangster Leader
text: Our old man was the founding boss of this organization and we all owe him a lotー
According to what the leader told usー
They were a local, small-time group of gangsters, a family-like organization united under a boss they called "old man."
Most of the members were abandoned or living on the street as children and had been taken in by their old man.
The Werewolf himself had been picked up as a baby from a dumpster by the old man, who had come to Yomihara for a job. He was a true "stray dog."
They had loved their old man as if he were their real father and had grown up together like brothers.
When Tokyo Kingdom turned into a lawless city, the organization had been on the brink of crisis many times but had barely managed to scrape along.
And after Nomad reached their shores, they became an affiliate of Dragon Gate and had somehow found a way to survive.

name: Gangster Leader
text: But thenーOur old man went to a Dragon Gate meeting, and to our shock, he came back as a Zombie!

name: Gangster Leader
text: Even small-time gangsters have their pride, so we were desperate to find the guys who did that to him.

name: Gangster Leader
text: And then we got a tip.

name: Gangster Leader
text: A tip that the alchemist living here had made a gas that turns people into Zombies and had her Taimanin minions spread it throughout the city.
ーThat sounded familiar. We reflexively looked at each other.

name: Shikanosuke
text: (Hey, Fuma, isn't that...)

name: Me
text: (Yeah, the "CD Virus." Dragon Gate also fits the story. He must've gotten caught up in it back then.)
The dreaded CD Virus that turns people into Zombies.
Gaiza had stolen it from the UFS and spread it around Dragon Gate establishments in order to take over their territory.

name: Me
text: (But how did this all turn into our, and this alchemist's, fault?)

name: Gangster Leader
text: With our old man having lost his mind, we had no choice but to...

name: Me
text: ...Kill him...?

name: Gangster Leader
text: No, we tied him up.

name: Me
text: So he's alive!?

name: Gangster Leader
text: None of us could kill our old man. But because he lost his mind and indiscriminately attacks anyone, we still keep him tied up and locked in the basement.

name: Gangster Leader
text: He'd be killed if someone found him. His body is rotting too, so we're not sure how long he'll...

name: Me
text: I see...
The gangsters lowered their heads in unison. And then...

name: Chevalier
text: If we're talking about medicine to turn a Zombie back into a human, I have some.
The alchemist Chevalier interjected.

name: Gangster Leader
text: Really!?

name: Chevalier
text: I was flooded with requests during that Zombie debacle, you know. I made a lot, so there's still some left over.
Chevalier took a small bottle from a shelf and showed it to us.

name: Gangster 1
text: Don't be fooled! She's the one who created the Zombie gas in the first place!

name: Me
text: Ah, about that. Allow me to explain.

name: Gangster Leader
text: You?
I explained everything I knew about the "CD Virus."
Starting from my connection to Gaiza, to our part-time job that had been connected to the transport of the CD gas, absolutely everything.

name: Me
text: ーAnd so we are after Nisha Gaiza, the leader behind this plot.

name: Gangster Leader
text: ...I see...
After hearing the whole story, the gangsters turned towards us with meek faces.

name: Gangster 2
text: We won't forgive that Gaiza guy!!

name: Gangster 1
text: Involving normal people, what a disgrace to gangsters!

name: Gangster 3
text: Must be hard for you to be betrayed by one of your own people. Sorry for suspecting you.

name: Me
text: (G-Good thing they're eager to sympathize ... Sometimes just explaining everything honestly also seems to work as a strategy...)

name: Jisai
text: I'm glad you were able to see our side.

name: Hebiko
text: It was looking pretty questionable at one point!
The wounds of Shishigami and Hebiko also seemed to have been completely healed by Chevalier's medicine.

name: Chevalier
text: Looks like we got the misunderstanding cleared up.

name: Gangster Leader
text: Yeah, we're going to try giving this medicine to our old man. By the way, you there, the octopus...

name: Hebiko
text: Eh? Hebiko?

name: Gangster Leader
text: It's my first time meeting a fellow shapeshifter, or... someone as beautiful as you.

name: Hebiko
text: Beautiful!?

name: Hebiko
text: Stop that! You smooth talker!!

name: Me
text: Ouch!! Why did you hit me, Hebiko?!

name: Gangster Leader
text: So, well, if you don't mind... being my... together with me...

name: Hebiko
text: Eh? Eh??

name: Gangster 2
text: Holy cow, this isn't the time for that! Come on, let's go home already and have the old man drink the medicine!!

name: Gangster 1
text: Sorry about that, he's not a bad guy but always a bit quick to fall in love.

name: Werewolf
text: 『ThaT'S NOT trUE! I'M beING siNCEre...』

name: Gangster 2
text: Yeah, yeah, turning into a wolf won't change anything. So long, Miss Alchemist.

name: Werewolf
text: 『HEBiko-SAN! AWOOOOOOHH!!!!』
The Werewolf was dragged away by the gangsters, howling begrudgingly as they left.

name: Me
text: Sheesh...

name: Chevalier
text: Thank you for driving away those bandits, all you cute Taimanin.

name: Chevalier
text: So, what's the real issue at hand? You didn't come all the way here for no reason, surely.

name: Me
text: Yeah, we came here because we heard that you're a knowledgeable alchemist.

name: Me
text: We are Taimanin from Gosha. It's a long story, but I want to know more about the "power of demons." Do you have a book or something like that you'd sell to me?

name: Chevalier
text: Hmm...

name: Chevalier
text: Be a bit more specific. Various things could be called the power of demons. For example, the power to create fire or wind, or the power to open a gate to another world.

name: Chevalier
text: There's also the power of regeneration to heal physical wounds. Like that Werewolf from earlier.

name: Me
text: ーRegeneration! That's it.

name: Me
text: I want to know more about the power of regeneration, like that Werewolf used!!!
Chevalier laughed elegantly.

name: Chevalier
text: Right then, the power of regeneration.

name: Me
text: Do you have anything in mind?

name: Chevalier
text: Yes. But Chevalier's archives are extensive.

name: Chevalier
text: Come back again later. In the meantime, Chevalier will find some books for you.

name: Chevalier
text: But temper your expectations. There are not many demons who write down every little thing the way you humans do.

name: Me
text: Yes, please help me if you can.

name: Chevalier
text: And also.

name: Me
text: And also?

name: Chevalier
text: These books will not be sold for money. You understand, don't you?
Chevalier smiled bewitchingly.

name: Me
text: (Not for money... I see.)
She must have wanted me to take on some kind of request, like Madam, the information broker, always did. That was more convenient for me as well.

name: Me
text: Alright. Anytime, just ask me.
And on the way home we stopped at the market again.

name: Me
text: Hey, what's wrong? You look like you've seen a Zombie.

name: Zocht
text: Y-You're... still alive?
Upon seeing my face at the store again, Zocht went pale.

name: Me
text: That's right. We should be dead by now after being attacked by those gangsters, right?

name: Zocht
text: N-Not sure what you're talking about...
Seeing Shishigami stand behind me silently, Zocht visibly broke out in a cold sweat and backed away.

name: Me
text: Come now, don't get so tense.

name: Me
text: Thanks to you, we were able to meet the alchemist. And you got your payday selling that information to the gangsters.

name: Zocht
text: ...Heh, heheh, you seem to be quite understanding, kid.

name: Me
text: It's a win-win situation. And I mean, it's not like I'm suspecting you of trying to get rid of us at the same time, even though you loathe us so much.

name: Zocht
text: ...Damn it.

name: Me
text: That's how it is. I'll be counting on you if something else comes up.

name: Zocht
text: ...Hmph, fair enough.
And like that, I got my hands on another source of information, and we left Tokyo Kingdom.
